list_of_reviews.review: They closed my account without any explanation. It's locked, and they are not letting me withdraw my funds! They stole my crypto and my money!!! I can't get it out! I would call their customer support cr*p if it existed...they do nothing to help you neither through chat nor phone!Folks, for those of you considering using Coinbase, if you're reading this, I beg you to stay the hell away from this scam ass company!Coinbase, you'll be hearing from my attorney.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Shady Company!!! Read the Reviews, will tell you everything that you need to know
list_of_reviews.review: Shady!!! ZERO Customer services BS chats, they string you along until you get sick & tired of being sick & tired! Stay TFA......Customer Service is a joke,,,they escalate then you never here back except with FAQ's. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!

Sure, a scam, please avoid. I transferred the money to Coinbase but accidentally transferred it to a blockchain, which was confirmed by Binance. Coinbase, then tell me they cannot trace the money. It is a scam because you have to log a ticket each time. It shows that they don't want to resolve anything but just prolong the issues until the person gets fed up and gives up. What a bloody scam. No support, what so ever. I will take further action.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My Coinbase has been under review for…
list_of_reviews.review: My Coinbase has been under review for months and I cannot update or transfer anything. Impossible to get in contact and my last case 18002392 has been closed without resolution. SImply not good enough Coinbase

Don’t invest a penny in this app! It will eventually take small amounts of money from you and you only have the option to chat via text and nothing will get returned or explained. You will just grow highly frustrated and eventually leave without getting any of your money back and call it a loss because of lack of customer service . You have been warned
Ok for me so far, olthough charging §1 for any small transaction to/ftom solid currency is a way to much and demotivated me to learn by playing.

Coinbase closed my account for no other reason than they wanted my money. Calling and chatting with so called "help desk"was a waste of time. "Support" politely informed me that I cannot cash out my remaining balance, which qualifies for THEFT. As the "Support" disconnected me abruptly, I could not save the Support Case Number.

Caution! Caution!  I had a Coinbase account for a few years mostly small dollars.  I recently moved over $40K into my account and Coinbase immediately froze it for security reason.  Original hold was for 7 days.  After verification that all was good, on day 6 Coinbase increased hold to 30 days.  Then 3 days later after another verification process, Coinbase restarted the 30-day clock. Pretty sure in 30 days Coinbase will find another reason to lock out funds for even longer.  Best not to ever use them if you value you funds or expect customer service.

I’ve been using Coinbase for 2 years. Woke up today to a message that my account has been suspended without providing any reason. When I tried to withdraw my remaining funds to my bank it would say “can’t withdraw due to connection issues” after talking to their customer support for about an hour I received zero help, the customer support clearly didn’t have any idea of what they are doing. All I got was “you’ll be contacted by email asap”I would highly recommend checking out other platforms.

You can’t. They can lock/ restrict/close your account at any time and with no reason explained. Although they look all hi tech and professional they are scammers and their customer service is a joke. I am in the process of retrieving my money from them- the formal complaint takes 45 business days to process. All this time they will be holding your money hostage. Their customer service is very circular providing no solution- bouncing customers from one chat to another, you CANNOT talk to a real person. Beware and if do use them dont hold a lot of money there- you will not be able to get them out.

Customer support qualifies for the worst possible score. They reply with the same text all the times: "We apologize for the inconvenience, but your inquiry details did not successfully transfer over to this case. In order for us to better assist you, can you please provide information or clarification as to how we can help?"AND IMMEDIATELY after this message they close the case. And they NEVER reply to my follow up email in which I resend the question according to their request. Probably this is the technique for the customer care staff to spare the work. Strange is different personas send the same canned text, like if it was not one person's technique... They reply and close the ticket, and if they are not checked further technically it looks like a resolved case. This happened now the second time with the same problem.

I have been a customer for a couple years using the service sometimes as investment (only $2000-3000), and primarily to fund online activities. Over the last few month I noticed the fee in and out increasing everytime I moved money. Then a couple days ago I moved $88. The fee was $68 leaving me $20 actually sent. The worst part was there is absolutely no warning. An hour later I was finally able to chat with customer service who said too bad, the "blockchain" decides the fee. I am definitely out of coinbase.
I am new in Coinbase, but this app seems to work normally.Having some more experience, I will write more in my review.

I have transferred £1000 to my coinbase account on Feb 8th using WesternUnion. WesternUnion confirmed the funds successfully reached the Coinbase Bank Account.Coinbase has never deposited my money on my Coinbase account and they have keep telling me they have sent the money back to Western Union without providing any evidence they have done so.Coinbase steal my funds!!! Rubbish company, I am now raising a formal legal case and raise it with the financial-ombudsmanTHis company is rubbish despite being listed on the New York stockexchange they do not comply with financial institution FCA rules.It is impossible to speak to anyone they only speak through chat bots and emails. Their employees are incompetent  and ignorant to understand the situation After 3 months they are still asking me to provide my bank account statement to show i have not received the funds, they are so ignorant the do not understand I have used Western UNion and if they have not received the fund back from Coinbase bank there is no money returned to my back account...If they cannot handle traditional banking system imagine how much crypto they steal from people with micro transaction! The company must be closed down, and investigated and audited

list_of_reviews.review_title: Prefer Coinbase pro but Coinbase advanced is fairly easy to use…
list_of_reviews.review: Coinbase advanced is fairly easy to use as an experienced crypto trader - but I still preferred Coinbase pro.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don’t invest a penny in this app
list_of_reviews.review: Don’t invest a penny in this app! It will eventually take small amounts of money from you and you only have the option to chat via text and nothing will get returned or explained. You will just grow highly frustrated and eventually leave without getting any of your money back and call it a loss because of lack of customer service . You have been warned

Honestly the most painful customer experience I’ve encountered to date. The representative assigned to assist me was simply unable to comprehend the issue after 45+ minutes of communication. They subsequently locked me out of my account. Now when I attempt to verify my UK address I receive a notification stating ‘incorrect country’. I now live abroad and when I raise a complaint/ticket, it automatically closes the case and sends me an email advising ‘Initially, Coinbase will only offer self-help customer support in your region’. Apparently it’s not possible to call the helpline from outside the UK either. There is no further avenue to solve this issue. An average rating 1.6* based on 9,000 reviews says it all really. Avoid.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful customer support and KYC process
list_of_reviews.review: I have opened an account at Coinbase in December and they still haven't removed my limitations as my account is still under manual review. The KYC process take too long, especially since they reply to my emails every 30 days approximately. I have sent all the required documents in every iteration of their requests, but they always come back with additional ones that weren't there before. Why not just ask me all the required documents and questions straight away? And now I wait for 30 days between each request until god knows when. It's been almost 5 months and the customer support is slow and unable to give me any straight answers.

Transferred $4500 of GUSD to my wallet, they stole the funds and there is no way to get any support or get the money back.  Coinbase is 100% a scam.Reply to the coinbase reply:I tried to contact support several times, every time they say "I'm looking into that now, give me a while to look" and they never reply ever again....They have never given me a case number and it seems impossible to talk to a human.Second update.  After seeing my review Coinbase support contacted me and was able to resolve my issue.  It's a shame that the only way to contact support is to write a review here, but at least they solved the issue.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The ratings on here do not represent…
list_of_reviews.review: The ratings on here do not represent the site. I feel the majority number of ratings are done by people who are not familiar with crypto, or only use it in exchange if there's no other option before exchanging for fiat. Coinbase has treated me extremely well, and i do feel safe. Coinbase pro and all of the new features/futures/learn and earn. It's a good very easy to use exchange with endless opportunity. Once everything is dialed in with latency during major moves/max traffic in bull markets this is 5 star review for me.

Scam, be careful. They just take the money and don’t let you withdraw it in any way! They simply delete old bank accounts and prohibit the withdrawal of cryptocurrency. They don’t make any refunds, and technical support just comes up with new reasons every time why you can’t get your money back.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The new system with Coinbase Wallet is…
list_of_reviews.review: The new system with Coinbase Wallet is frustratingI have send some money with Ethereum to another wallet.But the receiving end never received it.When the hash fully been checked and the status is on Completed.It have been more than 24 hours.

Signed up. Undertook one transaction, bought Litecoin then tried to send it to pay for something. Account locked for 30 days. Had to sell and unwind transaction. Coinbase took their fees on both sides of the transaction and locked my account.

Coinbase is having liquidity issues and is trying to prevent you from cashing out, when trying to cash out for me the app just got stuck when loading. Support is horrible, they are just ignoring you or telling you to update the app, only way i cashed out is by sending crypto to another wallet.

They have been asking from compliance department to complete my KYC for almost 2 years, I have been trying to solve it but they keep asking for papers every one two months? They just wanna make me tired and make me loose my money…

list_of_reviews.review_title: You have to fight tooth and nail just…
list_of_reviews.review: You have to fight tooth and nail just to withdraw money. The customer support is electronic only and is terrible. They place freezes on your account for reasons that aren’t understood. I’ve been waiting almost 10 days just to complete a withdrawal.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A good platform for a non expert to trade cryptos
list_of_reviews.review: I have found the platform a good place for a non expert to trade crypto currencies and I have had no problems trading or recovering my funds when I come out of the market. Hard to understand why there are so many negative reviews.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They deleted my account right after my…
list_of_reviews.review: They deleted my account right after my registrationPhone support could only say "This decision is final" and ignored my questions about the reason for the closure.As I see by reviews, I was fortunate since I didn't lose any money

list_of_reviews.review_title: Shady Company!!! Read the Reviews, will tell you everything that you need to know
list_of_reviews.review: Shady!!! ZERO Customer services BS chats, they string you along until you get sick & tired of being sick & tired! Stay TFA......Customer Service is a joke,,,they escalate then you never here back except with FAQ's. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I don't know why everybody leaves a bad…
list_of_reviews.review: I don't know why everybody leaves a bad review I asked for cashout at midnight got up in the morning and I got my money. Also contacted support before that and they answered my question instantly.
Terrible customer servicesI mean really really bad customer services.Website is also lagging and the graph and account summary graph is so behind in timing its a joke.
Been with Coinbase for several years. It’s the safest, most trusted and probably easiest way to participate in crypto. Never had any issues.

Unfortunately there aren’t many alternative options when it comes to regulated crypto exchanges, Coinbase pretty much has a monopoly and taking full advantage by illegal practices that involve random unjustified account freezes. A huge problem I have had as a decade long customer is they refuse to provide any customer support by phone. Everything is forcibly done through email by design so they have unlimited time to resolve your case. Sometimes an account is left hanging for months, even over minor issues. They also use overseas reps who are often useless and serve as mere secretaries who’s purpose is to stall or hand out case numbers. I wish the FTC would investigate there practices because no bank or credit card company would get away with this, but for some strange reason these guys get a pass because they are crypto.

Horrible experience. For the past three years I have had money domiciled with coinbase and my account has been under manual review.There is no way of contacting their customers service and speaking to a representative.

Sure, a scam, please avoid. I transferred the money to Coinbase but accidentally transferred it to a blockchain, which was confirmed by Binance. Coinbase, then tell me they cannot trace the money. It is a scam because you have to log a ticket each time. It shows that they don't want to resolve anything but just prolong the issues until the person gets fed up and gives up. What a bloody scam. No support, what so ever. I will take further action.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My Coinbase has been under review for…
list_of_reviews.review: My Coinbase has been under review for months and I cannot update or transfer anything. Impossible to get in contact and my last case 18002392 has been closed without resolution. SImply not good enough Coinbase

Don’t invest a penny in this app! It will eventually take small amounts of money from you and you only have the option to chat via text and nothing will get returned or explained. You will just grow highly frustrated and eventually leave without getting any of your money back and call it a loss because of lack of customer service . You have been warned

Coinbase closed my account for no other reason than they wanted my money. Calling and chatting with so called "help desk"was a waste of time. "Support" politely informed me that I cannot cash out my remaining balance, which qualifies for THEFT. As the "Support" disconnected me abruptly, I could not save the Support Case Number.

I’ve been using Coinbase for 2 years. Woke up today to a message that my account has been suspended without providing any reason. When I tried to withdraw my remaining funds to my bank it would say “can’t withdraw due to connection issues” after talking to their customer support for about an hour I received zero help, the customer support clearly didn’t have any idea of what they are doing. All I got was “you’ll be contacted by email asap”I would highly recommend checking out other platforms.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay away!!  They will steal your money!!
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible service!!!  My account has been restricted from May of last year!!  All the documents were submitted,  all questions answered - nothing changes..  Call their customer service a dozen of times,  but it is useless.  All they do is email the KYC team asking to review the submitted paperwork. Totally a joke!!  Filed a complaint with their complaint department several times( they can review it up to 90 days!),  received an answer that the KYC team is still waiting for me to submit the paperwork!!  I called Support,  sked which paperwork I still need to submit - they responded that all necessary paperwork was submitted already and that the KYC team just needs to review it. 🤷‍♂️ Recently begin to receive generic emails from KYC team requesting to confirm my account and providing with the FAQ links to the general info. The last link they send me with the request to provide the info was broken! I replied to the email with explanation and screenshots- no response. Called the customer service- no results . And there is NO Time-limits for them to review your KYC info.Mine has been in “a manual review “ for 6 months now…My account with $20,000 is restricted. Not able to withdraw my money, not able to buy coins or anything else…Filed a complaint again… I got a feeling that they are just regular scammers and the owner will be another Bankman-Fried from FTX and end up in jail.Bad ,bad actors. Do NOT recommend!!!! P.S.Read on Reddit that it was still possible to withdraw your coins while the account was under review . Withdrawing mine for sure!!!

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify common themes and issues mentioned in the reviews about coinbase.com. Summarize the main points of dissatisfaction or satisfaction among users. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common themes in the reviews include account suspension without clear reason, inability to withdraw funds, unhelpful customer support, and unresolved cases. Users express significant dissatisfaction with the lack of resolution and communication from Coinbase.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Examine the reviews over different dates provided and analyze if there are any trends or changes in user sentiment or the types of issues reported over time. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews consistently report poor customer service, account access issues, and lack of resolution, indicating persistent problems with user experience over time without significant improvement in the company's response or service quality.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for coinbase.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases and words indicating concern: "account under review," "impossible to get in contact," "customer support," "account suspended," "can't withdraw," "connection issues," "no help," "takes small amounts of money," "lack of customer service," "steals clients' money," "manual review," "no way of contacting," "scam."

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the actual ratings or a numerical dataset to calculate an average rating or analyze the distribution of ratings. The reviews provided are mixed, with some users expressing satisfaction and others dissatisfaction, but without numerical ratings, I cannot perform a quantitative analysis.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Generate concise summaries for each review to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
1. "Shady Company!!! Read the Reviews" - User warns of a disreputable company with unhelpful customer service.
2. "Shady!!! ZERO Customer services" - Customer frustrated with non-responsive service and lack of follow-up.
3. "I don't know why everybody leaves a bad…" - User had a positive experience with quick cashout and responsive support.
4. "Terrible customer services" - Complaint about very poor customer service and technical issues with the website.
5. "Safest place to be" - User's account is locked for months, poor communication from the company, unresolved issues.
6. "Caution" - A simple warning, suggesting potential issues with the company or service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight successful trading and prompt withdrawals, while negative reviews focus on account closures, poor customer service, and technical issues with the platform. Key differentiators are reliability of service and quality of customer support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the coinbase.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews indicate that Coinbase's customer support is largely ineffective and unresponsive, with customers experiencing unresolved issues, long wait times, and a lack of helpful assistance through available support channels.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Based on the review sentiments and contents, predict potential future issues coinbase.com might face or areas where they could improve. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Coinbase may face reputational damage and potential legal challenges due to poor customer service, account suspensions without clear reasons, and prolonged review processes. Improvements are needed in transparency, customer support responsiveness, and resolution efficiency to maintain user trust and compliance with regulatory standards.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify any outliers or unusual reviews that deviate significantly from the general consensus, which might warrant further investigation. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Based on the provided context, there are no outlier reviews presented. All reviews share a negative sentiment towards Coinbase, citing issues with customer service, account restrictions, and a lack of resolution. Further investigation would require additional positive reviews for comparison.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of the company in question suggest a pattern of customer dissatisfaction, primarily centered around poor customer service and issues with account management. Users report problems such as account closures, difficulties in withdrawing funds, and technical glitches within the platform. The recurring theme of accounts being under review and the inability to contact customer support for resolution are critical issues that undermine trust in the company. There is a notable absence of positive feedback in the provided context, which indicates a need for the company to improve its reliability and customer service responsiveness. Further investigation would be necessary to assess the full scope of the issues and to identify any positive aspects of the service that may not have been captured in the provided reviews.
